about_the_game:
You can extract images quickly and easily without drawing your smartphone images one by one.

3D phone simulator can quickly create smartphone images that can be used in various places including Webtoon and Drawing. Instead of drawing a smartphone and editing the image on the smartphone screen, you can create it using our amazing 3D phone simulator.

If you use 3D phone simulator together with 2D screen generator, you can create the smartphone image even faster. Be sure to check our other program too!

Main features
- You can put the image you want on the screen. (16:9, 19.5:9 aspect ratio provided)
- You can make or decorate the phone using components.
- Save or load templates
- Export 16k in high-definition at the desired resolution.

Details
- Components can be moved, rotated, color changed and scaled.
- Provides 55 pre-made templates.
- 6 types of screens are provided.
- You can adjust the edge line thickness to create an effect that matches the webtoon.
- You can adjust the transparency of the program.
- Different textures can be expressed through the shading function.
- Grid can be shown or hidden.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB GPU RAM, OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Phone Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB GPU RAM, OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
